content: तापन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [तप्-णिच् भावे ल्युट्] {@--1@} Heating, inflaming. {@--2@} Distressing. --नः {@--1@} The sun. {@--2@} The hot season. {@--3@} The sun-stone. {@--4@} <ab>N.</ab> of one of the arrows of Cupid. --नं {@--1@} Burning. {@--2@} Distressing. {@--3@} Chastising. {@--4@} A division of hell. {@--5@} Gold.
